# Agent Instructions

<!-- >>> ForgeCrew (managed - do not edit) >>> -->
## ForgeCrew

**IMPORTANT:** Read `forgecrew/START.md` for agent instructions.

This project uses ForgeCrew for agent coordination. Role definitions are
available via `mcp__pride__doc_read` with built-in keys (e.g., `role-engineer`).
Project standards are in `forgecrew/docs/`.

For help with ForgeCrew commands:
- `forgecrew help` - General help
- `mcp__den__*` - Git workflow tools (see tool descriptions)
- `mcp__pride__*` - Agent lifecycle tools (see tool descriptions)
<!-- <<< ForgeCrew <<< -->
